titleStmt.title: Commune Concilium tent' apud Gresham-House London die Jovis, vicesimo primo die Martii, anno Domini 1666, annoque regin Domini nostri Caroli Secundi, Dei Gratia, Angliæ, Scotiæ, Franciæ & Hiberniæ Regis, Fidei Defensor', &c. decimonono, coram Willielmo Bolton milit' Major Civitat' London, Johanne Lawrence, Thoma Bludworth & Willielmo Turner, militibus & amdermannis, Samuele Starling, armigero, aldermanno, Georgio Waterman, Roberto Hanson & Willielmo Hooker, milit' & aldermannis, & Johanne Moore, armigero, aldermanno, necnon majore parte communiariorum de Communi Concilio ejusdem Civitat' tunc & ibidem assemblat'. Whereas in the act of this present Parliament for re-building the City of London ...
Acts & Orders. 1667-03-21.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to the Honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place and date of publication from Wing.
Year given according to Lady Day dating.
"Naming the high streets and streets of note"--Steele.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
